crypto

Class Password

  • java.lang.Object
    • crypto.Password

  • public class Password
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that stores passwords securely.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Password(java.lang.String password)
      Create a new password.
      Password(java.lang.String password, int hashLength)
      Create a new password.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(byte[] bytes)
      Compares a hash with this password's hash.
      boolean equals(Password pass)
      Compares another Password with this one.
      boolean equals(java.lang.String pass)
      Compares a string-formatted password with this one using the given salt.
      byte[] getHash()
      Get the hashed password.
      int getIterations()
      Get the number of PBKDF2 iterations used to hash the password.
      byte[] getSalt()
      Gets the password hash's salt.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Password

        public Password(java.lang.String password)
        Create a new password. Hashing is performed automatically. Hash length defaults to 128.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to hash in string form.

      • Password

        public Password(java.lang.String password,
                int hashLength)
        Create a new password. Hashing is performed automatically.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to hash in string form.
        hashLength - The desired hash length.

    • Method Detail

      • getHash

        public byte[] getHash()
        Get the hashed password.
        Returns:
        The hashed password as a String.

      • getSalt

        public byte[] getSalt()
        Gets the password hash's salt.
        Returns:
        The hashed password as a String.

      • getIterations

        public int getIterations()
        Get the number of PBKDF2 iterations used to hash the password.
        Returns:
        The number of PBKDF2 iterations used to hash the password.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(byte[] bytes)
        Compares a hash with this password's hash.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The hash to compare.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the hashes (and therefore source passwords) are the same.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.String pass)
        Compares a string-formatted password with this one using the given salt.
        Parameters:
        pass - The password to compare in string form.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the passwords are the same.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Password pass)
        Compares another Password with this one.
        Parameters:
        pass - The password to compare.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the passwords are the same.
